name: Contacts Manager (Backbone)
tagline: A contacts manager app using Backbone.js.  Once can add contacts, sort by any of the fields, edit any of the contacts, and add categories for each contact.
body:
### Backbone Contacts Manager
This app uses Backbone.js to make the front-end of a contacts manager.  It's currently not connected to a database, meaning that the contacts can't be persisted.  The user can add contacts, delete, sort, edit, and add categories for contacts.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
